usage_rules.headings: Use 'Outfit' for all H1-H3. Weight: 600 or 700. Tracking: -0.02em.
usage_rules.body: Use 'Manrope' for all body text. Weight: 400 (regular) or 500 (medium).
usage_rules.data_display: Use 'JetBrains Mono' for code snippets or technical skills lists.

usage_rules.primary_action: Use 'bg-primary' for main CTAs (Apply, Save, Upload).
usage_rules.ai_features: Use a gradient of 'from-violet-600 to-indigo-600' for AI-related buttons or badges.

marketing_page.hero_style: Split Screen: Left Typography (Bold), Right Visual (Image + Floating Cards)

dashboard.grid_type: Mode B: The Control Room Grid
dashboard.structure: Sidebar (Fixed Left) + Topbar + Main Content Area
dashboard.card_style: Flat, 1px border (border-border), no shadow (or very subtle shadow-sm)

buttons.default: h-10 px-4 py-2 rounded-md font-medium transition-all active:scale-95

cards.base: rounded-lg border border-border bg-card text-card-foreground shadow-sm

inputs.style: h-10 w-full rounded-md border border-input bg-background px-3 py-2 text-sm ring-offset-background file:border-0 file:bg-transparent file:text-sm file:font-medium placeholder:text-muted-foreground focus-visible:outline-none focus-visible:ring-2 focus-visible:ring-ring focus-visible:ring-offset-2 disabled:cursor-not-allowed disabled:opacity-50

images.description: Smiling professional working on laptop - Use for Hero Section Right Side
Diverse team meeting - Use for About Us or 'For Companies' section
Man in modern kitchen - Use for Candidate Testimonial
Team collaborating - Use for Recruiter Testimonial

universal_guidelines.spacing: Use generous padding. Minimum 'p-6' for cards. 'py-20' for landing page sections.
universal_guidelines.contrast: Ensure text contrast is WCAG AA compliant. Use 'text-slate-600' for secondary text on white backgrounds, never lighter.
universal_guidelines.interaction: All interactive elements must have a hover state and active state. Use 'transition-all duration-200'.
universal_guidelines.testing: Add 'data-testid' to all buttons, inputs, and links.
anti_patterns: Do not use generic 'Inter' font for headings.
Do not center text in long paragraphs (left align for readability).
Do not use 'alert' or native browser prompts.

instructions_to_main_agent.setup: 1. Update 'index.css' with the provided color variables. 2. Add font imports to 'index.css' or 'index.html'. 3. Configure 'tailwind.config.js' to extend the font family.
instructions_to_main_agent.implementation_order: 1. Landing Page (Hero -> Features -> CTA). 2. Auth Pages. 3. Dashboard Layout (Sidebar + Header). 4. Resume Builder (Complex State).
instructions_to_main_agent.state_management: Use React Context or Zustand for managing the 'Resume State' across the builder steps.
instructions_to_main_agent.mocking: Mock the AI response with a 2-second delay and a realistic JSON response structure for the resume data.
